Financial Aid



 

Making a world-class education possible
We meet the full demonstrated need, without loans, for every admitted undergrad who qualifies for financial assistance.





 Applying for Aid
Application requirements, forms and deadlines. Note: We cannot confirm receipt of financial aid application requirements for admission applicants until after admission decisions have been released.
 Undergraduate Students
 Graduate Students
In the Spotlight



Stanford expands financial aid for 2023–24
Undergraduate families with incomes below $100,000 will not have to pay tuition, room, or board, trustees announced as they set tuition for the coming year.






Federal student loan debt relief
Under the Biden Loan Forgiveness program, borrowers of federal student loans could apply to have up to $10,000 in debt discharged. Those who received Pell Grants could qualify to have up to $20,000 discharged. However, this program is currently on hold due to court orders. Be sure to avoid debt-relief scams.






Who's my parent when I fill out the FAFSA?
The answer may not be as simple as you think! Use this guide to determine who should complete the Parent section of your FAFSA.
